# default

**Type Property**

The default collision filter.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: CollisionFilter
```

## Discussion

Entities with a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionFilter/default] collision filter have a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionFilter/group] of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionGroup/default] and a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionFilter/mask] of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CollisionGroup/all].

## Creating a collision filter

- **init(group:mask:)**: Creates a collision filter.
- **sensor**: A collision filter for an entity that collides with everything.
